name: webdav-backup
description: A simple, fast, and efficient tool for backing up files to a WebDAV server

scripts.build: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap ./index.ts --outfile ./dist/webdav-backup-linux-x64 --target=bun-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap ./index.ts --outfile ./dist/webdav-backup-macos-arm64 --target=bun-macos-arm64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap ./index.ts --outfile ./dist/webdav-backup-macos-x64 --target=bun-macos-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap ./index.ts --outfile ./dist/webdav-backup-windows-x64 --target=bun-windows-x64

author: ngarate
